headline: Applied Materials forecasts upbeat results on AI demand, memory shortage
summary: Applied Materials forecast second-quarter revenue and profit above market estimates on Thursday, betting on a boom ‌in demand for AI processors and a worldwide memory ‌shortage to help drive sales of its chipmaking equipment. The company's shares rose over 9% ​in extended trading. Shares of peers Lam Research and KLA both rose more than 2% in extended trading, as Applied's upbeat outlook lifted sentiment.
